process.name: CalculateModel
process.description: Run SoilTemperature model for one day and update soil temperature state and related energy terms.

inputs.name: defaultInstrumentHeight
inputs.description: Default instrument height if none provided

inputs.name: pInitialValues
inputs.description: Initial soil temperatures by layer or None

inputs.name: numPhantomNodes
inputs.description: Number of phantom nodes below profile

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Soil evaporation at potential under canopy

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Current initial soil temperatures by layer (state carrier)

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Number of thermal nodes including phantom nodes

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Provisional updated node temperatures for current substep

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Air temperature used at air node in current step

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Water content by layer (and phantom layers)

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Minimum soil temperature recorded during day by node

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Maximum soil temperature recorded during day by node

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Average soil temperature accumulated during day by node

inputs.name: aveSoilWater
inputs.description: Average soil water tracker (optional, not updated here)

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Layer thickness including phantom layers array (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density including phantom layers array (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rocks fraction including phantom layers array (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand fraction including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt fraction including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay fraction including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height used for met measurements

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation used in surface energy balance at substeps

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Effective canopy height (m) derived from microclimate or roughness

inputs.name: constantBoundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Constant boundary layer conductance if used

inputs.name: numIterationsForBoundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Iterations for stability-coupled boundary layer conductance

inputs.name: timestep
inputs.description: External timestep span represented in a process call

inputs.name: soilConstituentNames
inputs.description: Constituent names used in mixture models

outputs.name: InitialValues
outputs.description: Initial soil temperatures by layer (state carrier)

outputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
outputs.description: Current time of day in seconds at end of step

outputs.name: morningSoilTemp
outputs.description: Snapshot of soil temperatures near morning (5:00)

outputs.name: newTemperature
outputs.description: Provisional updated temperatures after last substep

outputs.name: airTemperature
outputs.description: Air temperature used at air node

outputs.name: maxTempYesterday
outputs.description: Max air temperature of previous day

outputs.name: minTempYesterday
outputs.description: Min air temperature of previous day

outputs.name: soilWater
outputs.description: Updated water content by layer (and phantom layers)

outputs.name: minSoilTemp
outputs.description: Minimum soil temperatures over the day by node

outputs.name: maxSoilTemp
outputs.description: Maximum soil temperatures over the day by node

outputs.name: aveSoilTemp
outputs.description: Average soil temperatures over the day by node

outputs.name: aveSoilWater
outputs.description: Average soil water over the day by node (optional)

outputs.name: canopyHeight
outputs.description: Effective canopy height (m) used in boundary layer calc

outputs.name: instrumHeight
outputs.description: Original measured instrument height passed through

functions.name: getIniVariables
functions.description: Pick instrument height from measured or default.

functions.name: getProfileVariables
functions.description: Builds profile arrays (thickness, nodeDepth, soil properties) and initialises temperature-related arrays.

functions.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
functions.description: Compute thermal conductivity coefficient arrays from texture and bulk density.

functions.name: readParam
functions.description: Compute conductivity coefficients, initialise soil temperature profile, and set roughness height.

functions.name: getOtherVariables
functions.description: Update soil water from water balance and adjust instrument/canopy heights.

functions.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionRocks
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionIce
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of ice (always 0 here).

functions.name: volumetricFractionWater
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of water by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionClay
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of clay by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSilt
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of silt by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSand
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of sand by layer.

functions.name: kelvinT
functions.description: Convert Celsius to Kelvin.

functions.name: Divide
functions.description: Safe division with error return.

functions.name: Sum
functions.description: Sum over a list segment ignoring MissingValue.

functions.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Return specific heat by constituent name.

functions.name: volumetricFractionAir
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of air as residual of other fractions.

functions.name: airDensity
functions.description: Air density from temperature and pressure.

functions.name: longWaveRadn
functions.description: Longwave radiation given emissivity and temperature.

functions.name: mapLayer2Node
functions.description: Interpolate layer values to nodes using depths and thickness.

functions.name: ThermalConductance
functions.description: Return conductance proxy for a constituent (note: code overrides with specific heat).

functions.name: shapeFactor
functions.description: Geometric shape factor by constituent for effective media model.

functions.name: doUpdate
functions.description: Update daily min/max/avg soil temperatures and accumulate boundary layer conductance.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Thomas algorithm solver for tridiagonal system of heat balance to get new node temperatures.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Iteratively compute boundary layer conductance with stability corrections.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Interpolate net radiation at substep using SW and LW components.

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Diurnal air temperature interpolation using sinusoid.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Compute effective thermal conductivity and map to nodes.

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Compute effective volumetric specific heat and map to nodes.

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Zero an array in-place if not None.

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Compute solar time distribution, cloud fraction and cva for a day.

functions.name: doProcess
functions.description: Main sub-daily loop: computes air temp, net radiation, boundary layer conductance, solves temperatures, and aggregates diagnostics.

functions.name: ToCumThickness
functions.description: Convert layer thicknesses to cumulative thickness.

functions.name: calcSoilTemperature
functions.description: Initialise soil temperature profile from annual sinusoid.

functions.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Estimate surface temperature from albedo, mean and max air T, and radiation.

functions.name: ValuesInArray
functions.description: Check if an array contains at least one non-missing value.

functions.name: math_pi
functions.description: Return mathematical constant pi.

functions.name: math_sin
functions.description: Sine function.

functions.name: math_cos
functions.description: Cosine function.

functions.name: math_log
functions.description: Natural logarithm.

functions.name: math_exp
functions.description: Exponential function.

functions.name: is_nan
functions.description: Check NaN.

comments.comment: CalculateModel is treated as the major process function; doProcess performs the heavy sub-daily physics inside it.
Node arrays use 1-indexing-like conventions (arrays sized numNodes+2) and include phantom layers; units for several energy terms are not explicit in code.
Booleans are represented as INT type in this schema due to allowed datatype constraints.
soilConstituentNames is a list of strings but recorded as CHAR with unspecified length due to schema limitations.
nodeDepth and soilRoughnessHeight are passed into CalculateModel but not returned; they are considered parameters here.
Function ThermalConductance sets result based on name but is overwritten at the end by volumetricSpecificHeat, likely a code defect; documented as-is.
aveSoilWater is carried as state but not updated by CalculateModel; remains optional/None.
